remarks: The Inversion Axiom of the infinite-valued sentential logic (L-infinity) of Lukasiewicz, but where one of the propositions is decidable.  Using ~ dfor2dc , we can see that this expresses "disjunction commutes." Theorem *2.69 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 108 (plus the decidability condition).  (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-2004.)
statement: looinvdc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( ( ( ph -> ps ) -> ps ) -> ( ( ps -> ph ) -> ph ) ) ) $.
